name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】KIARA & FRIENDS： H!P Cover Song Spring Concert #HPmeetsHoloEN [jjLLByDa3Xc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Independent Girl ～独立女子であるために～' (Buono! cover).
scenes.song_name: Independent Girl ～独立女子であるために～

subtitles.original: 街行く人を眺めてた
subtitles.english: I was watching the people passing by.

subtitles.original: 本当に笑い合ってる子なんて
subtitles.english: I wonder if there are any girls

subtitles.original: いるのかしら...
subtitles.english: who are truly laughing together...

subtitles.original: ヘッドホンから流れてる
subtitles.english: Flowing from my headphones,

subtitles.original: お気に入りの曲が繰り返し
subtitles.english: my favorite song repeats over and over.

subtitles.original: この歌詞は私のこと歌ってる...
subtitles.english: These lyrics are singing about me...

subtitles.original: 望んだのと私 素直にはまれない
subtitles.english: I can't honestly get into what I hoped for.

subtitles.original: 誰にでも合わせたい hah-ha
subtitles.english: I want to fit in with everyone, hah-ha.

subtitles.original: Oh Baby 明日何にするの私 何を求めてるの ah-yeah
subtitles.english: Oh Baby, what am I doing tomorrow? What am I looking for? ah-yeah.

subtitles.original: 愛が足りない
subtitles.english: Love is not enough.

subtitles.original: だけど意味なく群れたりしない だってそんなの勿体ない You know
subtitles.english: But I don't hang out aimlessly, because that's just a waste of time, you know.

subtitles.original: 愛したい
subtitles.english: I want to love.

subtitles.original: なんちゃって恋愛を繰り返す 女の子の気持ち
subtitles.english: The feelings of a girl repeating make-believe romances.

subtitles.original: 誰にでも分かっちゃうわ 女の子なら
subtitles.english: Any girl would understand.

subtitles.original: なんちゃって色々と言うけれど 輝きたいだけ
subtitles.english: I say all these things, but I just want to shine.

subtitles.original: 私でもなれるかしら 本物に...
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can become the real thing...

subtitles.original: なんちゃって恋愛をしたとこで 寂しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: Even if I have a make-believe romance, it just makes me lonely.

subtitles.original: それなのに温もりを 感じたくなる
subtitles.english: And yet, I still want to feel warmth.

subtitles.original: なんちゃっていい奴を演じても 虚しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: Even if I pretend to be a 'nice person', it just feels empty.

subtitles.original: それなのに適当に 愛されたい
subtitles.english: And yet, I want to be loved in a casual way.

subtitles.original: なんちゃって恋愛を繰り返す 女の子の気持ち
subtitles.english: The feelings of a girl repeating make-believe romances.

subtitles.original: 誰にでも分かっちゃうわ 女の子なら
subtitles.english: Any girl would understand.

subtitles.original: なんちゃって色々と言うけれど 輝きたいだけ
subtitles.english: I say all these things, but I just want to shine.

subtitles.original: 私でもなれるかしら 本物に
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can become the real thing.

subtitles.original: Independent Girl ～独立女子であるために～
subtitles.english: Independent Girl ~To Be an Independent Woman~

subtitles.original: 目を覚ましてよ そんな涙を
subtitles.english: Wake up! The one who made you shed

subtitles.original: 流させたのは 彼なんて
subtitles.english: those tears is just some guy.

subtitles.original: あなたのことを 愛していたら
subtitles.english: If he really loved you,

subtitles.original: きっとひどい事 できないはずでしょ
subtitles.english: surely he wouldn't be able to do such a terrible thing.

subtitles.original: おかしいよ 気付かないうち
subtitles.english: It's strange. Before you know it,

subtitles.original: 人に振り回されちゃって
subtitles.english: you're being jerked around by others.

subtitles.original: 服のセンスとか 髪の色まで
subtitles.english: From your sense of fashion to the color of your hair,

subtitles.original: 誰かの言いなりになってる
subtitles.english: you're doing whatever someone else tells you.

subtitles.original: 恋は盲目っていうよ
subtitles.english: They say love is blind.

subtitles.original: バッドメディシンみたいなもんよ
subtitles.english: It's like a bad medicine.

subtitles.original: 本当の愛はそんな
subtitles.english: Real love isn't

subtitles.original: 辛くなんかないやいやい
subtitles.english: painful like that at all.

subtitles.original: Independent Girl じゃなきゃダメさ
subtitles.english: You've got to be an Independent Girl.

subtitles.original: Ah-ah 声を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Ah-ah, let me hear your voice.

subtitles.original: 誰かのものなんかじゃないんだ
subtitles.english: We're not someone else's property.

subtitles.original: 私たち Independent
subtitles.english: We're Independent.

subtitles.original: Girl じゃなきゃダメさ
subtitles.english: You've got to be a Girl.

subtitles.original: Ah-ah こっちを向いてよ
subtitles.english: Ah-ah, look over here.

subtitles.original: 自分の生き方くらい
subtitles.english: Try deciding your own way of life

subtitles.original: 自分で決めてみなよ
subtitles.english: by yourself.

subtitles.original: ニコニコ笑う 馬鹿な女に
subtitles.english: For you, who has stooped down to being

subtitles.original: 成り下がってる あなたなんて
subtitles.english: a foolish woman who just smiles and nods...

subtitles.original: 本当のあなた なんかじゃないわ
subtitles.english: ...that's not the real you.

subtitles.original: 早く現実に 気付いて
subtitles.english: Realize the truth soon.

subtitles.original: 携帯 やたらにチェックされて
subtitles.english: Your phone is checked all the time,

subtitles.original: 身動き取れない毎日
subtitles.english: every day you can't even move freely.

subtitles.original: まるで奴隷みたいよ 悲しい...
subtitles.english: You're like a slave. It's sad...
